original_text: A sower went out to sow his seed: and as he sowed, some fell by the way side; and it was trodden down, and the fowls of the air devoured it.
korean_text: 씨를 뿌리는 자가 그 씨를 뿌리러 나가서 뿌릴새 더러는 길 가에 떨어지매 밟히며 공중의 새들이 먹어버렸고

sentences.original_text: A sower went out to sow his seed:
sentences.korean_translation: 한 씨 뿌리는 사람이 씨를 뿌리러 나갔습니다:

sentences.original_text: some fell by the way side;
and the fowls of the air devoured it.
